title: Yoghurt dressing

preparations.content: Place plain yoghurt, mustard, grapeseed oil, lemon juice, honey, apple juice, salt and pepper into mixing bowl and mix <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer into an airtight jar or bottle and serve immediately or store in the refrigerator.

hintsAndTricks: Use dressing on green leaf salads or salads combining chopped raw vegetables and fruit.
This dressing keeps for up to 3 days in the refrigerator.
Create your own dressing, using this recipe as a basic guideline. Try different types of oil and fruit juice and add seasonings and flavours of your choice.
